Everything is a web page

summary: Pokémon Emerald Seaglass is one of the many, many-many fan-made ROM hacks I have come across one way or another that are installed in my beloved Anbernic  RG40XXV.  At its core, it is just Pokémon Emerald with a Generation 2 Pokémon games (Gold, Silver, Crystal) look.  The sprites are designed in a Game Boy Color (GBC) style, redone environments , and battle backgrounds...
